00017 edBoolean = gridlib.GRID_VALUE_CHOICE + ':true,false' 
00018 edString = gridlib.GRID_VALUE_STRING
00019 edFloat = gridlib.GRID_VALUE_FLOAT
00020 edBool = gridlib.GRID_VALUE_BOOL
00021 edInt = gridlib.GRID_VALUE_NUMBER
00022 edCapstyle = gridlib.GRID_VALUE_CHOICE + ':butt,round,projecting'
00023 edJoinstyle = gridlib.GRID_VALUE_CHOICE + ':miter,round,bevel'
00024 edLinestyle = gridlib.GRID_VALUE_CHOICE + ':-,--,-.,:,steps,None'
00025 edMarker = gridlib.GRID_VALUE_CHOICE + ':+,.,1,2,3,4'
00026 edAdjustable = gridlib.GRID_VALUE_CHOICE + ':box,datalim'
00027 edAnchor = gridlib.GRID_VALUE_CHOICE + ':C,SW,S,SE,E,NE,N,NW,W'
00028 edAspect = gridlib.GRID_VALUE_CHOICE + ':auto,equal'#also can do float
00029 edColor = gridlib.GRID_VALUE_CHOICE + ':blue,green,red,cyan,magenta,yellow,black,white'
00030 edNumpy = gridlib.GRID_VALUE_STRING
00031 edScale = gridlib.GRID_VALUE_CHOICE + ':linear,log'
